base_description: White rectangular cabinet with drawers, modern style.
part_description: Two drawers with horizontal handles, arranged vertically. Rectangular shape with a flat top and black base. Positioned on small wheels.
internal_interaction_description: The drawers slide in and out on tracks, allowing smooth opening and closing. The handles are securely attached to the drawer fronts, facilitating easy grip and movement. The structure is supported by a sturdy frame, ensuring stability.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or under a countertop. Its wheels allow easy movement across surfaces. The top can hold small items or decorations, while the drawers store various objects, accessible by pulling the handles.
